Interface RepoInterface<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of item this repository works with (e.g., UserModel).
ID - The type of the item's unique identifier (e.g., Integer for userID).
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationRepo, EnquiryRepo, OfficerRegistrationRepo, ProjectRepo, UserRepo
public interface RepoInterface<T,ID>
A blueprint for repository classes, defining standard ways to manage data. Repositories handle storing, finding, and deleting items (like users or projects).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    delete(ID ID)
    Deletes an item from the repository using its unique ID.
    List<T>
    findAll()
    Gets a list of all items stored in the repository.
    default T
    findByID(ID ID)
    Finds a specific item using its unique ID.
    void
    save(T entity)
    Saves an item.

  • Method Details

    • save

      void save(T entity)
      Saves an item. If it's new, it adds it. If it already exists, it might update it.
      Parameters:
      entity - The item to save.

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Gets a list of all items stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      A list containing all items.

    • findByID

      default T findByID(ID ID)
      Finds a specific item using its unique ID. This is optional for repositories to implement fully.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique ID of the item to find.
      Returns:
      The found item, or null if no item has that ID.

    • delete

      boolean delete(ID ID)
      Deletes an item from the repository using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique ID of the item to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the item was found and deleted, false otherwise.
